Smokescreen:



Smokescreen activated his comm. to Kluster.  "Kluster," he said into the 
comm. unit on his wrist, "I've got a comm. transmission from Prowl.  He, and 
three other Maximals are underfire from numerous Predacons.  I demand that I 
be let to go help them, sir."
